mapper.select: select u.user_nickname, b.board_title, b.board_content ,b.board_type, b.board_regist_date, b.board_update_date from boards b join users u on b.fk_board_user_idx = u.user_idx where board_type = #{boardType} and board_delete_date is null
mapper.insert: insert into boards (fk_board_user_idx, board_title, board_content, board_type) values ( #{userIdx}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardType});
